title: 10-hour power cuts announced for Wednesday (30)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka will impose 10 hours of power cuts on Wednesday (30) due to the unavailability of fuel for 750MW of thermal capacity,
Groups GHIJKL: 6 hours from 8 AM to 2 PM & 4 hours from 6 PM to 10 PM
Groups TUVW: 6 hours from 8 AM to 2 PM & 4 hours from 6 PM to 10 PM
Sri Lanka will prevail & engineer rapid economic recovery; President tells BIMSTEC
